availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Rosannah Davidson. Father of Almira Davidson, Elizabeth Davidson, Zerilda Davidson, Mary Jane Davidson, Abner Davidson, and Leander Davidson. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 62.
Find A Grave, "Jesse Davidson (March 1, 1809-November 11, 1893)," Memorial #16291290, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/16291290 (accessed May 17, 2018).
